attributes.action: BRING BACK ASGER TO THE CHELSEA FC CHAT PAGE !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
asger was an innocent person, although he was at times contravertial, he only spoke from his arse... i mean heart. 

i plead to you mr gordon brown... help us bring back Asger !!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
